entities.name: Carcinoma-in-situ
entities.description: A histologically proven, localized pre-invasion lesion where cancer cells have not yet penetrated the basement membrane.

entities.name: TNM Staging
entities.description: A classification system for staging cancer.

entities.name: FIGO
entities.description: Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique, a staging method.

entities.name: breast
entities.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

entities.name: corpus uteri
entities.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

entities.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

chunks.heading: Early Stage Cancer
chunks.section_path: SPACE FOR ENDORSEMENTS > Part B Definitions > Early Stage Cancer

entities.name: Early Stage Cancer
entities.description: The presence of certain malignant conditions.

entities.name: Tumour of the thyroid
entities.description: Histologically classified as T1N0M0 according to the TNM classification.

entities.name: Prostate tumour
entities.description: Histologically described as TNM Classification T1a or T1b or T1c.

entities.name: Chronic lymphocytic leukaemia
entities.description: Classified as RAI Stage I or II.

entities.name: Basal cell and squamous skin cancer
entities.description: That has spread to distant organs beyond the skin.

entities.name: Hodgkin's lymphoma
entities.description: Stage I by the Cotswolds classification staging system.

entities.name: Major Cancer
entities.description: A malignant tumour characterised by uncontrolled growth and spread of malignant cells.

entities.name: leukemia
entities.description: Included in the term cancer.

entities.name: lymphoma
entities.description: Included in the term cancer.

entities.name: sarcoma
entities.description: Included in the term cancer.

entities.name: Carcinoma in situ of breasts
entities.description: Excluded from the diagnosis of Major Cancer.

entities.name: Cervical dysplasia CIN-1, CIN-2 & CIN-3
entities.description: Excluded from the diagnosis of Major Cancer.

entities.name: invasive malignant melanoma
entities.description: The only skin cancer included in the diagnosis.

entities.name: Gleason score
entities.description: A scoring system for prostate tumours.

entities.name: Chronic lymphocyctic leukaemia
entities.description: Less than RAI stage 3 is excluded.

entities.name: urinary bladder
entities.description: Tumours histologically classified as T1N0M0 or below are excluded.

chunks.heading: b. Increased Benefit
chunks.section_path: SPACE FOR ENDORSEMENTS > Part C > b. Increased Benefit

entities.name: Policyholder
entities.description: The individual who holds the insurance policy.

entities.name: Gold Plan Option
entities.description: One of the insurance plan options available to the Policyholder.

entities.name: Platinum Plan Option
entities.description: Another insurance plan option available to the Policyholder.

entities.name: Income Benefit
entities.description: A benefit provided under the Platinum Plan Option for diagnosed major cancers.

entities.name: Applicable Sum Insured
entities.description: The initial Sum Insured plus any accruals under the Increased Benefits.

entities.name: Nominee
entities.description: The person designated to receive benefits in case of the Policyholder's death.

entities.name: Early Stage Cancer
entities.description: A type of cancer for which benefits are payable only once during the policy term.

entities.name: Carcinoma-in-situ (CIS)
entities.description: A specific type of early-stage cancer covered under the policy.

relations.evidence: This Benefit will be available in case the Policyholder has chosen the Gold or Platinum Plan Option.
This Benefit will be available only in case the Policyholder has chosen the Platinum Plan Option.
Upon the diagnosis of the listed major cancers, a monthly income equal to 1% of the Applicable Sum Insured will be payable for a fixed period of 5 years.
the remaining payouts under this benefit will be paid to his/her Nominee.
'Applicable Sum Insured' is the initial Sum Insured plus any accruals under the Increased Benefits defined above.
The benefits for Early Stage Cancer or Carcinoma-in-situ (CIS) shall be payable only once during the policy term.
The benefits for Early Stage Cancer or Carcinoma-in-situ (CIS) shall be payable only once during the policy term.

entities.name: Grievance Redressal Officer
entities.description: An officer responsible for handling customer grievances.

relations.evidence: All grievances (Service and sales) received by the Company will be responded to within the prescribed regulatory Turn Around Time (TAT) of 15 days.
The onus of intimation of change of address lies with the Policyholder.

The acknowledgement that is sent to the customer has the details of the complaint number, the Policy number and the Grievance Redressal Officer's name who will be handling the complaint of the customer.

entities.description: The governing body that specifies fees for assignment or transfer through regulations.

relations.relation: accept or decline to act upon
relations.evidence: The insurer may accept or decline to act upon any transfer or assignment or endorsement.
the Insurer should record the reasons in writing and communicate the same in writing to Policyholder.
within 30 days from the date of policyholder giving a notice of transfer or assignment.
any person aggrieved by the refusal may prefer a claim to IRDAI.
Fee to be paid for assignment or transfer can be specified by the Authority through Regulations.

entities.name: Insurance Act, 1938
entities.description: A legislative act governing insurance policies.

entities.name: Insurance Laws (Amendment) Act, 2015
entities.description: An amendment to the Insurance Act, 1938.

entities.name: insurer
entities.description: The entity providing the insurance policy.

entities.name: policyholder
entities.description: The individual who holds the insurance policy.

entities.name: nominee
entities.description: The person designated to receive the policy benefits.

entities.name: Authority
entities.description: The governing body that specifies regulations for insurers.

relations.evidence: The policyholder of a life insurance on his own life may nominate a person or persons.
Where the nominee is a minor, the policyholder may appoint any person to receive the money.
Fee to be paid to the insurer for registering change or cancellation of a nomination can be specified by the Authority.
A notice in writing of Change or Cancellation of nomination must be delivered to the insurer.

Early Stage Cancer
entities.description: The presence of certain malignant conditions.

entities.name: Tumour of the thyroid
entities.description: Histologically classified as T1N0M0 according to the TNM classification.

entities.name: Prostate tumour
entities.description: Histologically described as TNM Classification T1a or T1b or T1c.

entities.name: Chronic lymphocytic leukaemia
entities.description: Classified as RAI Stage I or II.

entities.id: entity:basal cell and squamous skin cancer
entities.name: Basal cell and squamous skin cancer
entities.description: That has spread to distant organs beyond the skin.

entities.name: Hodgkin's lymphoma
entities.description: Stage I by the Cotswolds classification staging system.

entities.name: Major Cancer
entities.description: A malignant tumour characterised by uncontrolled growth and spread of malignant cells.

entities.name: leukemia
entities.description: Included in the term cancer.

entities.name: lymphoma
entities.description: Included in the term cancer.

entities.name: sarcoma
entities.description: Included in the term cancer.

entities.name: Carcinoma in situ of breasts
entities.description: Excluded from the diagnosis of Major Cancer.

entities.name: Cervical dysplasia CIN-1, CIN-2 & CIN-3
entities.description: Excluded from the diagnosis of Major Cancer.

entities.name: invasive malignant melanoma
entities.description: The only skin cancer included in the diagnosis.

entities.name: Gleason score
entities.description: A scoring system for prostate tumours.

entities.name: Chronic lymphocyctic leukaemia
entities.description: Less than RAI stage 3 is excluded.

entities.name: urinary bladder
entities.description: Tumours histologically classified as T1N0M0 or below are excluded.

entities.description: One of the insurance plan options available to the Policyholder.

entities.name: Platinum Plan Option
entities.description: Another insurance plan option available to the Policyholder.

entities.name: Income Benefit
entities.description: A benefit provided under the Platinum Plan Option for diagnosed major cancers.

entities.name: Applicable Sum Insured
entities.description: The initial Sum Insured plus any accruals under the Increased Benefits.
